name: Golfbat Private Demo
description:
A game about shooting a golf ball through a course while avoiding bullets to get a high score.
Currently, the game is not released yet. If you want to get a feel of what it will be, and preorder the special version at the same time, you can pay a small amount for the demo. Be sure to join my discord server to recive updates on the demo you purchased here https://discord.gg/DBs2XFRkd6

Note! The full game will be free! There will be a special edition with more skins and stuff that will cost around 2 bucks. If you wanna play the game and not pay WAIT UNTIL IT RELEASES!
